Good afternoon Bobbi: 
We have receive your concerns and will be looking in to these matters. 
All concerns will be properly addressed as needed. 
Best, 
>>> BOBBI C STERNHEIM •<> 1/6/2021 2:38 AM >» 
Counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell learned that she has been issued a disciplinary charge. Please provide a copy of 
the Incident Report. 
Members of the same team who physically mistreated and threatened Ms. 
Maxwell on Sunday now claim that she is not tidy (See email below.) The basis of the charge is unclear -
because Ms. Maxwell has not deviated from her routine of the past 7 months. But the fact that it comes after Ms. 
Maxwell and counsel made complaints about staff is concerning, disturbing, and questionable. 
The policy of rotating in staff from other institutions has contributed to lack of consistency and clarity in the 
management of Ms. Maxwell. One team tells her one thing which is then contradicted by another team. 
One team tells her she can't keep books in her locker; another team tells her to put books in her locker. One team 
tells her to keep a set of clothes in her isolation cell; another team faults her for doing so. 
Ms. 
Maxwell's 
request for guidance is met with a terse response: "Read the A&O handbook." 
Ms. Maxwell cannot ask other inmates for help and is at the mercy of guards who appear to delight is their 
power over her. The present team was particularly harsh during a previous rotation and seem to have increased 
their contempt for Ms. Maxwell. 
Ms. Maxwell- and counsel- are concerned for her safety while in the custody of the present team. 
In lieu of an opportunity for Ms. Maxwell to be moved to another unit, and the unlikelihood that she would be 
transferred to the MCC as a result of Epstein's death while BOP was "asleep" on the watch, we are requesting 
that the present team be removed from guarding Ms. Maxwell. 
Issues still remain concerning Ms. Maxwell's meals.She still is not receiving items on the menu. 
Yesterday, she received the same meal for lunch and dinner. Tuesday morning she was given an inedible black 
and rotting banana. Over the weekend she was given bologna, despite being on a non-flesh diet. The guard 
EFTA00013290

informed her that the meat had not been refrigerated and recommended that she not eat it. 
The MDC's inability to provide proper nutrition is reoccurring and problematic. 
The problems keep escalating, giving rise to the belief that Ms. 
Maxwell is being targeted and victimized. I  urge you to address and correct these problems. The failure to do so 
will result in a request for court intervention. 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Rabbi C. Sternheim

and to an associate warden and was examined by

verbal incidents should have been captured on the hand-held 
> camera, used constantly to surveil Ms. Maxwell. 
> This is not the first time Ms. Maxwell has been touched

> Counsel for Ms. Maxwell make this report to put the MDC on notice: 
> Should Ms. Maxwell be further assaulted and threatened, we will file 
an official complaint with the Attorney General's Office and notify the Court. This will further blemish the 
BOP's reputation, already tarnished by negligence resulting in the death of Jeffrey Epstein. The restrictive

unprovoked rough treatment of Ms. Maxwell baffling.
